Resume

Data scientist & Statistician

This resume is available as a pdf.

Statistician with 1 year of Data Analyst Experience working with marketing data to create new tools for canvassing managers, forecast future sales and marketing budget needs, and conduct analyses to optimize sales with a given budget. I have communicated both technical details to non-technical stakeholders and negotiated contracts from both the buy side with lead vendors and the sell side with homeowners looking to protect their largest investment. My work has allowed me to be engaged in forecasting and optimization of marketing budgets and the education I gained at KU Leuven has increased my statistical techne.

Work Experience

DaBella
Marketing Data Analyst

July 2019 - August 2020

  • Reduced excess spend by an estimated $250,000 annually by on-boarding new software vendors to provide TCPA compliance and screen out duplicate prospects
  • Optimized canvasser deployment increasing leads by 5% using cluster analysis and predictive modeling
  • Ran and A/B tested email campaigns to previous customers using Mailchimp and Zapier, leading to 10% increase in customer referrals
  • Provided up to date reporting on the performance of the marketing funnel
  • Conducted meetings with lead vendors to target specific zipcodes and product classes using prior analysis to optimize sales given our marketing budget
  • Constructed marketing budget proposals given new branch openings, product mixes, historical sales, and ramp up factors
  • Sought out and partnered with new lead vendors, negotiated pricing, and monitored sales attributable to these vendors
1st Security Bank
Finance Intern

Summer 2018

  • Migrated financial data from balance sheet from excel sheets over to new platform for more accessible data formatting
  • Created a forecast of key figures over the next three years based on past performance data and branch opening schedule using a heuristic model
DaBella
Sales Representative

Summer 2017

  • Demonstrated a 30% closing rate on sales presentations, showing strong technical communication skills and the ability to build trust and value with stakeholders.
  • Sold new roofs to customers with a total one-month best of over $100,000 of product sold
  • Helped customers to complete financing applications for contracts averaging $21,500 each, communicating financing details and important facts to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Assisted customers in successfully navigating financing applications for contracts averaging, effectively translating loan application requirements to homeowners.
